Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
Main CLass Initialization of all the variables used in the game. Some of the variable were also assigned with their initial values Contains all the methods of the program.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    attack()
    Attack method damage random number between the max damage and min damage of the character enemy_hp current hp of the enemy hp is hp of the charcter the hp of the charcter minus the damage of the enemy the hp of the enemy minus the damage of the charcter calls the fight method if the character is still alive even if the enemy is already dead calls the died method if the character's hp is less than 0
    void
    Bandit()
    Contains the stats of the bandit(a type of an enemy) assigns values to the given parameters enemy_hp is hp of the bandit; each type of enemy have different hp enemy_max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the bandit, each type of enemy have different max damage enemy_min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the bandit, each type of enemy have different min damage
    void
    Blacksmith()
    Increments max and min damage by 5 max maximum damage that can be dealt by the character min minimum damage that can be dealt by the character bchance chance to access the blacksmith(only 1 chance) max plus 3 min plus 3 bchance minus 1 can be accessed by pressing 2 prints a line when max and min damage are enhanced prints a line when the blacksmith can no longer be accessed calls the method village
    void
    Castle()
    Where the king resides and the Creepy_Forest can be unlocked here can be accessed by pressing 3 answer either 1 yes or 2 no cfticket is the ticket to enter the Creepy_Forest if yes Creepy_Forest is unlucked if no the character will be escorted out from the castle cfticket will be assigned with 1 meaning the character can now enter the Creepy_Forest calls the method village
    void
    Creepy_Forest()
    Main mission of the game Fight three enemies(2 bandits and 1 raider) and save the princess choice is either to fight(1) or run(2) cfticket if it is 0 the character cannot enter and will return to the village, if it is 1 the character can enter enemy_killed is the number of enemies defeated lets the player choose to fight(1) the enemy or run(2) back to the village when enemy_killed is less than 3 if enemy_killed is 3 then the princess is saved
    void
    died()
    Called by the attack method when the hp of the charcter is less than 0 prints a line that indicates that the character is dead
    void
    fight()
    Prints the current hp of the character and that of the enemy and provides choics to attack(1) or run(2) choice is either to attack(1) or run(2) name of the player hp is the current hp of the charcter enemy_hp is thecurrent hp of the enemy
    void
    House()
    House of the character choice on how to interact with he step sibling in the house There is actually only one choice and that is to ignore the step sibling Just an addition to the game to add some fun
    void
    intro()
    Start of the game.
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    Main method The game is initialized Calls the method intro No parameters No return
    void
    Raider()
    Contains the stats of the raider(a type of an enemy) assigns values to the given parameters enemy_hp is hp of the raider; each type of enemy have different hp enemy_max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the raider, each type of enemy have different max damage enemy_min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the raider, each type of enemy have different min damage
    void
    role()
    Player chooses his/her role option is an integer variable which indicates the choice of the player returns none, but calls one of the following methods: Swodsman(), Shieldman(), Spearman().
    void
    Shieldsman()
    Contains the stats of the shieldsman role assigns values to the given parameters hp of the character; each role have different hp weapon is string which indicates the weapon of the character, each role have different weapon max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different max damage min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different min damage
    void
    Spearman()
    Contains the stats of the spearman role assigns values to the given parameters hp of the character; each role have different hp weapon is string which indicates the weapon of the character, each role have different weapon max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different max damage min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different min damage
    void
    stats()
    Prints the stats passed by the one of the roles methods(swordsman, shieldsman, spearman) hp of the character; each role have different hp weapon is string which indicates the weapon of the character, each role have different weapon max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different max damage min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different min damage can be accessed by pressing 6 when in the village calls the method village
    void
    Swordsman()
    Contains the stats of the swordsman role assigns values to the given parameters hp of the character; each role have different hp weapon is string which indicates the weapon of the character, each role have different weapon max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different max damage min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different min damage
    void
    Tavern()
    Restores hp by 5 for up to 3 times tchance is the chances to access the benefits of the tavern tchance minus 1 can be accessed by pressing 1 prints a line when hp is restored by 5 prints a line when the tavern is closed calls the method village
    void
    village()
    Most part of the game will involve this method The player will choose the location of his/her destination The player can also check the stats of their character Returns None, but calls one of the following methods:Tavern(), Blacksmith(), Castle(), House(), Creepy_Forest(), stats() depending on the value of the option variable

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public Game()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method The game is initialized Calls the method intro No parameters No return

    • intro

      public void intro()
      Start of the game. asks for name returns none, but prints the name of the character and calls the role() method first and then the village() method

    • village

      public void village()
      Most part of the game will involve this method The player will choose the location of his/her destination The player can also check the stats of their character Returns None, but calls one of the following methods:Tavern(), Blacksmith(), Castle(), House(), Creepy_Forest(), stats() depending on the value of the option variable

    • role

      public void role()
      Player chooses his/her role option is an integer variable which indicates the choice of the player returns none, but calls one of the following methods: Swodsman(), Shieldman(), Spearman(). depends on the value of role

    • Swordsman

      public void Swordsman()
      Contains the stats of the swordsman role assigns values to the given parameters hp of the character; each role have different hp weapon is string which indicates the weapon of the character, each role have different weapon max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different max damage min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different min damage

    • Shieldsman

      public void Shieldsman()
      Contains the stats of the shieldsman role assigns values to the given parameters hp of the character; each role have different hp weapon is string which indicates the weapon of the character, each role have different weapon max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different max damage min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different min damage

    • Spearman

      public void Spearman()
      Contains the stats of the spearman role assigns values to the given parameters hp of the character; each role have different hp weapon is string which indicates the weapon of the character, each role have different weapon max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different max damage min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different min damage

    • stats

      public void stats()
      Prints the stats passed by the one of the roles methods(swordsman, shieldsman, spearman) hp of the character; each role have different hp weapon is string which indicates the weapon of the character, each role have different weapon max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different max damage min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the character, each role have different min damage can be accessed by pressing 6 when in the village calls the method village

    • Bandit

      public void Bandit()
      Contains the stats of the bandit(a type of an enemy) assigns values to the given parameters enemy_hp is hp of the bandit; each type of enemy have different hp enemy_max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the bandit, each type of enemy have different max damage enemy_min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the bandit, each type of enemy have different min damage

    • Raider

      public void Raider()
      Contains the stats of the raider(a type of an enemy) assigns values to the given parameters enemy_hp is hp of the raider; each type of enemy have different hp enemy_max is maximum damage that can be dealt by the raider, each type of enemy have different max damage enemy_min is minimum damage that can be dealt by the raider, each type of enemy have different min damage

    • Tavern

      public void Tavern()
      Restores hp by 5 for up to 3 times tchance is the chances to access the benefits of the tavern tchance minus 1 can be accessed by pressing 1 prints a line when hp is restored by 5 prints a line when the tavern is closed calls the method village

    • Blacksmith

      public void Blacksmith()
      Increments max and min damage by 5 max maximum damage that can be dealt by the character min minimum damage that can be dealt by the character bchance chance to access the blacksmith(only 1 chance) max plus 3 min plus 3 bchance minus 1 can be accessed by pressing 2 prints a line when max and min damage are enhanced prints a line when the blacksmith can no longer be accessed calls the method village

    • Castle

      public void Castle()
      Where the king resides and the Creepy_Forest can be unlocked here can be accessed by pressing 3 answer either 1 yes or 2 no cfticket is the ticket to enter the Creepy_Forest if yes Creepy_Forest is unlucked if no the character will be escorted out from the castle cfticket will be assigned with 1 meaning the character can now enter the Creepy_Forest calls the method village

    • House

      public void House()
      House of the character choice on how to interact with he step sibling in the house There is actually only one choice and that is to ignore the step sibling Just an addition to the game to add some fun

    • Creepy_Forest

      public void Creepy_Forest()
      Main mission of the game Fight three enemies(2 bandits and 1 raider) and save the princess choice is either to fight(1) or run(2) cfticket if it is 0 the character cannot enter and will return to the village, if it is 1 the character can enter enemy_killed is the number of enemies defeated lets the player choose to fight(1) the enemy or run(2) back to the village when enemy_killed is less than 3 if enemy_killed is 3 then the princess is saved

    • fight

      public void fight()
      Prints the current hp of the character and that of the enemy and provides choics to attack(1) or run(2) choice is either to attack(1) or run(2) name of the player hp is the current hp of the charcter enemy_hp is thecurrent hp of the enemy

    • attack

      public void attack()
      Attack method damage random number between the max damage and min damage of the character enemy_hp current hp of the enemy hp is hp of the charcter the hp of the charcter minus the damage of the enemy the hp of the enemy minus the damage of the charcter calls the fight method if the character is still alive even if the enemy is already dead calls the died method if the character's hp is less than 0

    • died

      public void died()
      Called by the attack method when the hp of the charcter is less than 0 prints a line that indicates that the character is dead
